Package com.dermalog.android.imageio

The class ImageIOSDK provides access to the native library DermalogImageIO.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ImageIOException
    Represents errors that occur inside ImageIOSDK.
    ImageIOFormat
    ImageIOFormat is a utility class for image formats and options used by ImageIOSDK.
    ImageIOSDK
    ImageIOSDK is a utility class for conversion Image to and from BMP, WSQ and JPG2000 format.

Package com.dermalog.android.imageio Description

The class ImageIOSDK provides access to the native library DermalogImageIO.

Prerequisites: DermalogEmbeddedBiometrics for Android
Important: The call of initialize() requires an attached DERMALOG fingerprint scanner with granted USB permissions. Please refer to the documentation of DermalogEmbeddedBiometric on how to obtain permissions. 


ImageIOSDK imageIO = null;

try{
        imageIO = new ImageIOSDK(activity);

        //initialize the SDK (load native library etc)
        imageIO.initialize();
        
        //load PNG image as BMP
        byte[] imgData = imageIO.readImage("test.png", ImageIOFormat.BMP, "");
        
        //write BMP as WSQ with compression ratio 5:1
        imageIO.writeImage("output.wsq", imgData, ImageIOFormat.WSQ, 5);
}finally{
        if(imageIO != null)
        {
                //Important: Call uninitialize to free native resources 
                imageIO.uninitialize();
                imageIO = null;
        }
}
